StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetM8412_Retrieve_or_Count_Person]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @SSN varchar(9) = NULL, @LastName varchar(20) = NULL, @FirstName varchar(20) = NULL, @orgid int ) AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order By LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME) AS [RowNumber], p.PERSON_ID, 'xxx-xx-' + RIGHT(p.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER,4) AS [SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER], p.FIRST_NAME, p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, p.LAST_NAME, p.SUFFIX_CD, p.LAST_NAME + ', ' + p.FIRST_NAME AS [NAME], p.ORGANIZATION_ID, r.Current_Loca.on AS [Loca.on], CASE CHARINDEX('$', r.Current_Loca.on, 1) WHEN 0 then r.Current_Loca.on ELSE substring(r.Current_Loca.on, CHARINDEX('$',r.Current_Loca.on, 1)+1 , len(r.Current_Loca.on)-CHARINDEX('$', r.Current_Loca.on, 1)) END AS [Current_Loca.on], r.Billet, CONVERT(CHAR(111),r.Date_Billet, 111) AS [Date_Billet] FROM M8412_Person_View p LEFT OUTER JOIN M8412_Recruit_Person r ON p.Person_ID=r.Person_ID WHERE (r.Date_Re.re IS NULL AND r.Date_Void IS NULL) AND (p.ORGANIZATION_ID = @orgid OR p.ORGANIZATION_ID IN (SELECT Decendent FROM USMC.vwDecendentRecrui.ngOrgs WHERE Parent = @orgid)) AND (@SSN IS NULL OR p.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER LIKE @SSN) AND (@LastName IS NULL OR p.LAST_NAME LIKE @LastName+'%') AND (@FirstName IS NULL OR p.FIRST_NAME LIKE @FirstName+'%') ORDER BY p.LAST_NAME, p.FIRST_NAME, p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME
SET NOCOUNT OFF
